lines.gurmukhi: joeI imlY Awpw Koie soeI qau nwXkw hoie; mwn kIey mwnmqI pweIAY n mwn jI [

Unknown.translation: The seeker woman who sheds her ego and meets with dear husband, she alone is the loved wife of the husband. One cannot get honour and respect from the Lord if one feels haughty and egoistic.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijhVI Awpw guAwky iml pvy pqI nUM auho qwˆ ipAwrI pqnI ho jwˆdI hY[ hy mwx mqI! mwx kIiqAwˆ siqkwrXog pqI nhIˆ pwey jwˆdy[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Gnhr brsY srbqR sm; aucY n cVq jl bsq nIcwn jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as clouds rain equally in all places, its water cannot climb up the mounds. Water always go and settles at lower levels.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ b`dl sB Qwvwˆ qy ieko ijhw vrsdw hY; pr pwxI au`cw nhIˆ cVHdw nIvyˆ pwsy hI jw itkdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn smIp jYsy bUfÎo hY bfweI bwNs; Aws pws ibrK subws prvwn jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a bamboo stays in his pride of being high and lofty and remains bereft of the fragrance of sandalwood, but all big and small trees and plants absorb that sweet smell in themselves.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ cMdn dy kol ho ky BI vwˆs AwpxI vifAweI ivc fuibAw hoieAw hY ik mYˆ cMdn qoˆ BI au`cw hwˆ; pr Aws pws dy hor nIvyˆ ibRCwˆ nUM sohxI vwSnw pRvwn ho jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: ikRpw isMD ipRX qIX hoie mrjIvw giq; pwvq prmgiq srb inDwn jI [662[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, to be the wife of the ocean of kindness-dear Lord, one has to sacrifice oneself and become a living dead person. Only then can one acquire the treasure of all treasures (God's name from the True Guru) and reach the supreme divine state.  (662)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ikRpw dy smuMdr ipAwry dI jigAwsU rUp iesqrI mrjIauVy vwˆg ho ky hI prm gqI qy swrIAwˆ inDIAwˆ pw lYˆdI hY ]662]
